## TabNavigateCursor.validNode\_() method

Skip all nodes except for tab navigable fields.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
validNode_(node: ASTNode | null): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | ASTNode \| null | The AST node to check whether it is valid. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if the node should be visited, false otherwise.
